text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro's halls are adorned with<n>countless victories—and
I've finally<n>earned a plaque of my own!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I was not expecting such a<n>resounding display of joy from
the<n>ever-demure McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's clear just how much the race<n>meant to her, and why
she felt so<n>much pressure to win it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I apologize, I lost my composure. Ido believe I've earned a bit ofelation, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In addition, I want to thank you for<n>helping me reach this
result.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To think that you would dedicate all<n>your efforts just for
me... I am truly<n>grateful.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm the one who should be doing all<n>the thanking. You
placed all your faith<n>in a newbie trainer like me, and<n>
delivered an amazing win!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...If I were to say that to her now,<n>though, she would
probably scold me<n>for a lack of self-confidence.
choice_data_list: An amazing win for Team Sirius!
An amazing win for Team Sirius!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, yes. Let's continue to seize<n>them wherever the road
may take us!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now, I'll go make the winning concert<n>one to remember. It's
the least I can<n>do to thank everyone who cheered<n>me on!
